name: edsathenaeum
description: Website for a fictional Book Cafe as part of class portfolio project to demonstrate abilities.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.start: npm run scss && npm run lite
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin authors.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/authors.html && usemin books.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/books.html && usemin cafe.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/cafe.html && usemin events.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/events.html && usemin garden.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/garden.html && usemin rooms.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/rooms.html && usemin links.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/links.html

author: Ryan Mockelmann
